originalText: Ano ano ba ang mga Illegal Na Sigarilyo?

IlegalNaYosiCards.title: Contraband
IlegalNaYosiCards.description: Mga totoong produkto na legal na produced, ngunit smuggled dito sa Pilipinas.
palatandaan: No PH picture of health warning

IlegalNaYosiCards.title: Counterfeits
IlegalNaYosiCards.description: Mga pekeng copies ng mga brands na sikat at itinatangkilik.
palatandaan: Different Quality = smells/smokes different from the original brand

IlegalNaYosiCards.title: Illicit Whites
IlegalNaYosiCards.description: Mga brand na walang lisensyang ibenta sa Pilipinas at hindi matunton sa legal at mapagkakatiwalaang kumpanya.
palatandaan: Price is less than PHP5 per stick

IlegalNaYosiCards.title: Tax Under Paid
IlegalNaYosiCards.description: Genuine products licensed for sale in the PH but company producing them may not be fully paying their share of the “sin tax” for selling their product to you.
palatandaan: Different Quality = smells/smokes different from the original brand
